layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 246x30 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 244x28
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 244x24 [bgcolor=#CCFFFF]
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 240x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 236x19
                text run at (2,2) width 236: "THis table has zero % width declared"
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,30) size 218x30 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 216x28
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 216x24 [bgcolor=#CCFFFF]
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 212x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 208x19
                text run at (2,2) width 208: "THis table has no width declared"
